desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Start the game on the server this is run on. Used when linking new IRC networks.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Stop the game server on the server this is run on.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Register a new character on this IRC network.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Run any event for any logged in player.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Run a global event

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Reset a password for a player.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Force the bot to update IdleLands and reboot.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Ban a player.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Unban a player.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Teleport a player to a given location.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Teleport a player to a given set of coordinates.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Teleport all players to a given location.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Teleport all players to a given set of coordinates.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Generate a custom item for a player.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Give a player some gold.

syntax.name: syntax
syntax.extendedInfo: maxLevel | inventory | goldStorage | battleJoinPercent | itemFindTimeDuration | itemSellMultiplier | itemFindBonus | itemFindRangeMultiplier | xpPerGold | maxItemScore

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Manage your pets items, upgrade their stats, and feed them gold!

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is achieved by achieving achievements.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is obtained when creating a character. It only lasts for 3 days, so idle wisely.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by killing a unique number of bosses.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by becoming a unique number of classes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by becoming a new class.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by finding many little collectibles scattered throughout the world.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by entering a lot of battles.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by spending gold.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by performing a lot of critical hits.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by doing a lot of damage.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by receiving a lot of damage.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by killing a lot of bosses.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by experiencing a lot of events.

reward.name: reward
reward.extendedInfo: This only applies once for every 5 levels of Explorative.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by exploring unique maps.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by gaining and losing a lot of gold.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by achieving certain levels.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by exploring certain maps.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by killing unique players.

reward.name: reward
reward.basicInfo: Can now use a new personality

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by meeting the requirements for a personality.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by exploring unique regions.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement was earned by participating in IdleLands Alpha.

reward.name: reward
reward.extendedInfo: This only applies once for every 5 levels of Walkative.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This achievement is earned by walking a lot.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Absolute adds a static amount of damage to all of your attacks.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Aegis prevents critical hits.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Crit adds a bonus to your critical chance.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Dance doubles your base dodge chance.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Darkside makes it so you do more damage, but all of the bonus damage is taken by both the attacker and defender.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Deadeye doubles your chance to overcome the opponents dodge roll.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Defense adds a +10% boost to all of your defensive calculations.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Drunk changes your movements ever-so-slightly.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Fear makes it so no opponents can flee combat. Works well on Jesters!

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Glowing adds +5% to each of your combat calculations. It's pretty crazy.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Haste allows you to take one additional step per point of haste. You only gain xp for your first 5 steps.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Lethal makes all of your critical hits even more critical, so they deal 150% damage.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Mindwipe makes the target forget that they have any personalities.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Parry allows you the chance to counterattack if you dodge, deflect, or are missed by an attack.

stacks.name: stacks
stacks.extendedInfo: Stacking formula is +10% parry chance/parry point

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Poison is a small DoT that does damage based on the attackers wisdom.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Power adds a flat +10% to maximum damage possible.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Prone gives you the opportunity to stun an opponent when you physically hit them. The chance of a stun happening is 15%.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Punish allows you to return some damage back to the attacker.

stacks.name: stacks
stacks.extendedInfo: Stacking formula is +5% returned damage/punish point

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Offense adds a +10% boost for each of your offensive calculations.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Royal adds +1% xp gain at the end of combat. It also can go negative, which lowers your xp gain cap at the end of combat!

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Shatter has a chance to destroy the opponents defenses for a few turns.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Silver increases your minimum damage range by +10%.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Startle allows you to take away your opponents first turns.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Sturdy allows you to survive a fatal attack with 1 hp.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Vampire is a DoT that returns health to the attacker. The duration is determined by how many points of vampire the caster has.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Venom is a small DoT that does a static percentage of the victims health as damage.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Vorpal increases your minimum and maximum damage by +50%

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Forsaken makes it so every blessItem, flipStat, or forsakeItem hits this item. In the event that there are multiple forsaken items in your inventory, one will be chosen at random.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Limitless allows an item to exceed the enchantment level cap of 10.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Sacred makes it so there is no chance of this item being hit by blessItem, flipStat, or forsakeItem.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Sentimentality does nothing except take up valuable equipment score.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: Sticky makes it harder to have your item be replaced
desc.extendedInfo: or easier, if you have negative sticky

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Archer is a physical debuff/dps class. Their Focus stat increases critical chance by up to 50%, and allows access to powerful skills. Focus increases every turn and with use of the Take Aim skill, and decreases when the Archer is damaged as well as when it is spent.

special.name: special
special.extendedInfo: The Archer builds focus over time, resulting in devastating attacks if unchecked.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a physically powerful class. Their Rage is a powerful force that drastically increases their STR. Rage is accumulated by taking damage and watching allies die. Each point of rage adds to the Barbarians damage multiplier. They have an overall reduction in dex and agi to make up for their bulky nature. They also take half damage on physical attacks.

special.name: special
special.extendedInfo: The Barbarian gets Rage so they can power themselves up while they get beaten up.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a very supportive class. They sing their songs to buff their allies. If they have no allies, they are more likely to be an offensive force.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a debuffing magical class. It uses Bitrate to stun and destroy its foes.

special.name: special
special.extendedInfo: The Bitomancer gets a certain Bitrate with which to virtually assault their opponents.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a healing class. It has some powerful damaging spells, but mostly focuses on helping allies.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a damaging class. It can use skills to stun or attack multiple times.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class does a little bit of everything. They have an attack skill that attacks all opponents, a defensive skill, and a healing skill.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is a very lucky class. It uses its luck to affect everything. It also gets a bonus to having all events happen more often.

itemScore.name: itemScore
itemScore.extendedInfo: Note, all other stats are ignored except for special stats like offense, defense, etc

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is an offensive magical class. They use their numerous fireballs to burn their opponents into submission.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This is one of the default classes for all monsters in the game if not specified otherwise. It was added to the game for players for funsies.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This is one of the default classes for all monsters in the game if not specified otherwise. It was added to the game for players for funsies.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class is very rambunctious, and often throws bottles at foes.

special.name: special
special.extendedInfo: The Pirate gets 99 bottles, so they can sing many songs while drinking many bottles.

itemScore.name: itemScore
itemScore.basicInfo: con*2 + agi*1.5 + dex*1.5 - int - wis - luck*0.2

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class performs many deadly combos on its foes. Beware the finishing blow.

special.name: special
special.extendedInfo: The Rogue gets 100 stamina with which they can use skills that combo their foes.

itemScore.name: itemScore
itemScore.basicInfo: con*2 + agi*1.5 + dex*1.5 - int - wis - luck*0.2

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This class makes lunch for its allies and foes alike. It is a true savior, but watch out for the poison.

effect.name: effect
effect.basicInfo: +10% XP loss at end of combat

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality attempts to prevent you from fleeing from combat.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you target the weakest enemy when possible.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you Chaotic-aligned.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never want to leave parties.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you use skills far less.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality allows you to occasionally revive immediately after dying.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered DPS.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to target DPS-type classes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes.

effect.name: effect
effect.basicInfo: Less likely to get into battles

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you less likely to get into combat.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you move more erratically, and act generally silly.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you Evil-aligned.

effect.name: effect
effect.extendedInfo: Only applies to explorer actions - move, up stairs, down stairs, etc

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality affords you better explorer traits to navigate the world, at the cost of stats.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to use skills. For some classes, this means they will always use skills until they run out of casting capability.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you Good-aligned.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you both gain and lose more gold, at the cost of XP.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you move faster around the world, at the cost of combat statistics.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to leave parties.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you Lawful-aligned.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you charge into battle, like a famous WoW veteran.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered Magical.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered Medic.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to target Medic-type classes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality does nothing.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you very likely to flee combat.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered Physical.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you scared of the dark. Scaredy cat.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you both gain and lose more XP, at the cost of gold.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you never change items. You become more susceptible to switcheroos, though.

effect.name: effect
effect.basicInfo: Slightly more likely to get party gold blessings

effect.name: effect
effect.basicInfo: Slightly more likely to get party XP blessings

effect.name: effect
effect.basicInfo: Slightly more likely to get into parties

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered Support.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to target Support-type classes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you attempt to flee combat at lower hp values.

effect.name: effect
effect.basicInfo: Slightly more likely to get into battles

effect.name: effect
effect.basicInfo: Slightly more likely to have items forsaken

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you never change classes, unless the resulting class is considered Tank.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes you more likely to target Tank-type classes.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you are less likely to use teleports.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you find more, powerful items.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you are more likely to get into monster battles.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This personality makes it so you are less likely to go up stairs, and slightly less likely to go down stairs.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This region makes battles more frequent. Beware!

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This region has some nice wares.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This region gives you more strength. Hoo-ah!

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This region gives you strength and makes shops have better results.

desc.name: desc

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This region grants you a luck boost and makes shops cheaper.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This region grants a boost to fire damage.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This region grants you a shopping mall. Of course, there is a little inflation here, but the variety! It also reeks of ale.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This skill does very little damage, but leaves every combat effect available on the target. Currently, it will inflict Prone, Poison, Venom, and Shatter on the target. It's pretty nasty.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This skill hits multiple times for a moderate amount of damage.

desc.name: desc

desc.name: desc

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This skill attempts to give a resume to a target, assuming the caster has <=25% HP. Resumes can be accepted or rejected. The outcome can mean gaining or losing gold.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This skill feeds an ally. As for what that means, that depends on the sandwich made.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This skill burns up to 2 opponents. It also feeds them a sandwich, but it's most likely burnt to a crisp.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This skill stuns an opponent and does a bit of damage to them.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The AGI day raises agility.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Calamity day lowers luck.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Charisma day lowers shop prices.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The CON day increases constitution.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The DEX day increases dexterity.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Earth day increases all elemental stats.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Evil day increases all stats for all evil aligned entities - monsters and players alike. It lowers those stats for good players.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Good day increases all stats for all good aligned entities - monsters and players alike. It lowers those stats for evil players.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Humanity day increases all stats for players.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The INT day increases intelligence.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The LUCK day increases luck.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Monster day increases all stats for monsters.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The STR day increases strength.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The WIS day increases wisdom.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Boreas month increases ice.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Crono month increases healing.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Gaia month increases earth.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Hephaestus month increases fire.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Hermes month increases thunder.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Poseidon month increases water.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Zeus month increases physical spells.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Aether year increases energy and thunder.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Demeter year increases healing and earth.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Hades year increases fire and dark.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Serpentis year increases water and physical.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: The Uranus year increases ice and holy.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm runs every negative event on a player. Sucks, huh?

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm runs a random event on every player. Hope you're good at roulette.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm breaks up every party in the game.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm runs every positive event on every player. See, it's not so bad, now is it?

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm forsakes your experiences.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This cataclysm gives you some brightening experiences.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles both the enchant and tinker aliases, which add new stats to an item.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles equipping items, finding items, and selling items.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles the dreaded switcheroo - flipStat - event.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles both the blessGold and forsakeGold aliases.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles both the blessGold and forsakeGold aliases for a party.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles blessing or forsaking items.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event causes players to cry. They also lose a level. This does not occur naturally like most other events, it can only happen by stepping on bad tiles.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles purchasing an item for the player from a wandering merchant.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles building a monster encounter for a player.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles creating a party for the player.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event can be your best friend, or your worst enemy.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles both the blessXp and forsakeXp aliases.

desc.name: desc
desc.basicInfo: This event handles both the blessXp and forsakeXp aliases for parties.

items.name: Ward of the Black Dragon King

Corgi.description: Unlocked by being a collector of fine items.

Raven.description: Unlocked by keeping an eye out for shiny things.

Dolphin.description: Unlocked by finding some watery delicacies.

Minitaur.description: Unlocked by being a slayer of the ancients and a purveyor of their goods.

Chimera Dragon.description: Unlocked by being a connoisseur of all matters draconic.
